entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:05 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -32.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tadoule Lake Airport 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -32.3°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -35.6°C

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
